mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_PASSWORD, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_TEL, MEMBER_ADDR, TO_CHAR( ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24"시" MI"분" SS"초"' ) ENROLL_DATE, MEMBER_DEL_FL, CODE_NO FROM "MEMBER" WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL = #{memberEmail} AND MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "MEMBER" VALUES (SEQ_MEMBER_NO.NEXTVAL, #{memberEmail}, #{memberPassword}, #{memberNickname}, #{memberName}, #{memberTel}, #{memberAddr}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, 'MEMBER', DEFAULT)
